item.title: ServerWrapper
item.description: View Implementation The server is the controller of the match. It tells you where cars and balls are, the time remaining, score, and so much more. If not hosting the match (in an online or private match) all values are read-only. Some functions will also return garbage data in online matches to protect the competitive integrity of the game Get it with gameWrapper.GetCurrentGameState() BallWrapper GetBall()
